instructions: Download an app called Downloader from the Amazon Appstore. Long-press the Home button. Launch Downloader. In the box below Enter the URL of the website you want to load or the file you want to download , type https://kodi.tv/download and select Go . Use the remote to select Android . Choose either the 32-bit or 64-bit version of Kodi. First-generation Fire sticks have 32-bit CPUs; the newer ones have 64-bit. Choose the Release version of the app. Nightly builds are more likely to contain bugs. Wait for the APK file to download. When complete, Downloader will automatically attempt to install it. On the on-screen pop-up, click on Install .
